column4: hello, i must of goofed up my fresh install while using aptitude. when i launch aptitude it states "unable to resolve dependencies", and it wants to uninstall almost every package. DL 21GB???
it says I have 738 broken packages, but I just installed 8.10, and used aptitude to update the pc
use synaptic, fix broken. those packages are likely obsoleted.
thx i will try that now
